short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to get most relavent answers for you technical query.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Always stuck in a problem when developing a code ? Or usually forgot how to write certain code ? 

This extension is a simple tool which is made for developers.

The following problems it solves.

- Find answer to any programing problem in a single page instead of googling it over internet, this will go all those searching /sorting stuff for you and will provide you most relevant answers.

- A simple material UI for smooth look and feel.

- Code highlighting for code divisions.

- Various customization over stackoverflow api.

- Autocomplete and search history so you need to remember what you searched to get a answer.

- This is totally free and opensource. Contribute : https://github.com/Rjtsahu/Chrome-StackOverflow-Plugin

## This is first version of app, there will be lot of new features coming in upcoming releases. ###
